title: Andrew Hamilton (canoeist)
text:
Andrew Hamilton is a British canoeist based in <a href="Nottingham">Nottingham</a>, England. He competed in <a href="slalom%20canoeing">slalom canoeing</a> C1 from the mid-1990s to the mid-2000s and <a href="whitewater">whitewater</a> racing, single canoe (C1) and double canoe (C2) for <a href="Great%20Britain">Great Britain</a> between 2000 and 2010.
Competition.
His best international result in Slalom <a href="canoeing">canoeing</a> was 8th place in the Ocoee Pre-World Championships in 2000. His results were:
